Detailed Description

Wind power calculator calculates the power output of a wind turbine farm.

Requires an initialized windTurbine and wakeModel, as well as the following variables: nTurbines, turbulenceIntensity, YCoords, XCoords. The windPowerUsingResource and windPowerUsingWeibull require allocated vectors for inputs and outputs.
